food_menu.food: "title": "Fauget Tuna (8 pcs)", "description": "White tuna sashimi garnished with fresh mango and grilled garlic.", "price": "$22", "photo": "img/Aikawa-tuna-300x200.jpg"

"title": "Atlantis (8 pcs)", "description": "Crabstick, asparagus, fried carrot, tempura, tobiko and avocado rolled in a soya bean leaf, topped with smoked-salmon.", "price": "$21", "photo": "img/Atlantis-is-for-smoked.jpg"

"title": "Besame Mucho (8 pcs)", "description": "Spicy tuna, crispy tempura, cooked shrimps and avocado rolled in a soya bean leaf.", "price": "$22",
"photo": "img/jade2-1-300x200.jpg"
"title": "Salmon Sensation (8 pcs)", "description": "Spicy salmon, avocado, lettuce, shiso leaf, tobiko.", "price": "$21", "photo": "img/Salmon-flavor-spicy-salmon.jpg"

"title": "Heaven* (6 pcs)", "description": "6 Pieces of red tuna sashimi on grilled-rice medallion, topped with shiso leaves rolled with smoked-salmon.", "price": "$22", "photo": "img/Heaven-300x200.jpg"
"title": "Rainbow Sashimi (9 pcs)", "description": "Slices of tuna, salmon and white snapper sashimi with a soy-based sauce. ", "price": "$21", "photo": "img/Rainbow-Sashimi-1-300x200.jpg"
"title": "Spicy Sunshine (4 pcs)", "description": "A tasty seasoned tartar of fresh scallops and crab, served on 4 sweet potato chips.", "price": "$23", "photo": "img/Spicy-Sunshine-tartar.jpg"
"title": "Mango Tango* (8 pcs)", "description": "Tempura shrimp, raw scallop, tobiko and mango strips rolled in soya bean leaf.", "price": "$22", "photo": "img/Mango-Tango-the-mango.jpg"
"title": "Rose Maki (8 pcs)", "description": "A soya bean leaf wrapped roll with tuna, tempura shrimp, avocado, tobiko and fresh asparagus.", "price": "$22", "photo": "img/Rose-Maki-300x200.jpg"
"title": "New York*", "description": "Srimp tempura, orange, massago, spicy mayo.", "price": "$21", "photo": "img/new-york-300x200.jpg"

"title": "Rom√©o et Juliette* (6 pcs)", "description": "A slightly tempura breaded roll with tempura shrimps, strawberries, pineapple and blueberries.", "price": "$20", "photo": "img/Romeo-300x200.jpg"
"title": "Dragon Ears (4 pcs)", "description": "Tartare of tuna, crab and shrimp with avocado served on wonton chips", "price": "$23", "photo": "img/Dragon-Ears-300x200.jpg"

"title": "French Kiss (4 pcs)", "description": "A tastily seasoned tartar of fresh shrimps, salmon and tuna, served on 4 shrimps chips with tobiko.", "price": "$22", "photo": "img/french-kiss-1-300x200.jpg"
